headlines.description: — Terry Rozier scored 27 points, Gordon Hayward had 26 points and a season-high 11 rebounds and the Charlotte Hornets beat the Washington Wizards 114-104 on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rozier scores 27 points, leads Hornets past Wizards 114-104

headlines.description: — Jamal Murray scored 30 points, Michael Porter Jr. added 27 and the Denver Nuggets raced out to a 25-point lead on their way to a 104-95 win over the slow-starting Philadelphia 76ers on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Murray, Porter lead Nuggets past slow-starting 76ers 104-95

headlines.description: — Chuma Okeke scored 18 points and the Orlando Magic rallied in the fourth quarter to snap Los Angeles' six-game winning streak Tuesday night, defeating the Clippers 103-96.
headlines.shortLinkText: Magic rally in fourth, snap Clippers' six-game win streak

headlines.description: — Devin Booker scored 21 points, Dario Saric added 20 and the Phoenix Suns held on in the final minutes to beat the Atlanta Hawks 117-110 on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Suns turn away late Hawks rally for a 117-110 victory
